alert.note: Alert for Ozark; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 14 at 12:25AM CDT until August 14 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ozark County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Taney County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 115 AM CDT. * At 1225 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northeast of Diamond City, or 18 miles northwest of Bull Shoals, moving east at 35 mph. This replaces the Severe Thunderstorm Warnings expiring at 1230 AM CDT. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bull Shoals Lake, Norfork Lake, Gainesville, Bakersfield, Theodosia, Pontiac, Sundown, Willhoit, Tecumseh, Udall, Hardenville, Protem, Rueter, Long Run, Isabella and Zanoni. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
